title: Rise of Qinglian - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Alchemy   Artifact Crafting   Battle Competition   Beast Companions   Beasts   Body Tempering   Buddhism   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Clan Building   Crafting   Cultivation   Dao Companion   Demons   Dolls/Puppets   Engagement   Familial Love   Family   Fantasy Creatures   Ghosts   Inheritance   Lucky Protagonist   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Multiple Realms   Orcs   Pets   Reincarnation   Slow Growth at Start   Soul Power   Souls   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Time Skip   Wars   Weak to Strong

description: Through the efforts of its clansmen, a small family of cultivators slowly established itself into a clan of immortals. This is the record of how a single, small clan came to flourish in strength and numbers.>
